Package uk.ac.ebi.gxa.utils

Class Summary
Base64 Encodes and decodes to and from Base64 notation.
Base64.InputStream A Base64.InputStream will read data from another java.io.InputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
Base64.OutputStream A Base64.OutputStream will write data to another java.io.OutputStream, given in the constructor, and encode/decode to/from Base64 notation on the fly.
CollectionUtil  
CountIterator  
Deque<T> A very simple and loose queue implementation based on linked list of arrays (deque).
EmptyIterator  
EscapeUtil String escaping utility functions
FileUtil  
FilterIterator<From,To> Filtering iterator class handy to make lazily filtered and mapped iteration out of another iterator From - source element type To - target element type Misfunctionality: can't output null's as null menas "skip this element"
FlattenIterator<Outer,Inner> Iterator base class, allowing to flatten nested iterators into one sequence
JoinIterator<From1,From2,To> Join iterator pattern allows to iterator over two other iterators in sequence, doing mapping Can have two different input element types and two mapping function, each of them can be used for filtering elements out - just return null value to mit element in output.
MappingIterator<From,To> Simple mapping iterator pattern: maps source iterated element to result of any expression using them From - source element type To - target element type
Pair<A,B> Pair container class A - first element type B - second element type
StringUtil Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
